about_the_game:
Escalate the battle between predator and prey with these five new Traits: Pounce, Last Stand, Claws, Invasive Species, and Coprophagia

Pounce allows predators to bypass a defense. Stand up for yourself with Last Stand and lash back at Carnivores. Claws give a Body Size boost on both offense and defense. Enjoy experimenting with the changes these new cards bring to the ecosystem.

You can add any combination of these cards to AI games, or make your own deck for Pass & Play and Private games. You can also add one to public multiplayer games, which is then added into the combined deck everyone plays from.
